name: Anvi'o Pan-Genome Analysis
description: Pan-Genome Analysis using the Anvi'o software library

output_name.help: Prefix to use for all output files

min_occurrence.help: Minimum threshold of the number of genomes which a gene must be found in

minbit.help: Stringency of clustering for groups of amino acid sequences (ranges from 0 - 1)

mcl_inflation.help: Parameter used to control how similar two genes have to be for grouping together (recommend 10 for closely related genomes, 2 for comparing across species)

category_name.help: Optional: Column in manifest used to define comparison groups

gene_enrichment.help: Optional: If specified, compute enrichment at the gene level (instead of by pathway)

min_alignment_fraction.help: Optional: If specified, any genome pairs with ANI differences below this level will have their ANI levels set to 0 (ranges from 0 - 1)

ani_program.help: Program used to compute ANI. Options: pyANI (default), fastANI, sourmash.

nxf_profile.help: Profile used for resource allocation (standard or testing)
